item.description:
This is more of an announcement than a meetup although you are welcome to meetup and wear your retro rockabilly garb. I will be.. You can spot me on the Upright bass with the Sequin vest.. This is a auto show that is fun for the whole family...  And for you car enthusiast this is the place to be..  This is how to have fun on a Friday night.. SEE You There...

Jim

Juke Joint Rhythm Rockers..

 

Be sure not to miss real, live rockabilly sets by The Juke Joint Rhythm Rockers & Whiskey Kill Friday nite at 7pm. also pin-up contest Saturday, model car display/contest in our club display, & a best tattoo kontest. you will also be able to purchase a pine wood derby car for our season opener race & we'll also have plenty of NEW support shirts for sale there too! there's also tons of fancy/expensive show cars, vendors, & booze there too if you get tired of looking at our junk...fun for the hole family!

http://www.autorama.com/?page_id=249

http://www.facebook.com/pages/The-Juke-Joint-Rhythm-Rockers/103918483054954?ref=ts&fref=ts

http://www.facebook.com/pages/Whiskey-Kill/158220957524826?ref=ts&fref=
item.name: Boston World of Wheels - Juke Joint Rhythm Rockers and Whiskey Kill
